comments:

We need to escape the "${" sequence somehow, since it's used in rendering.
*** Bug 58962 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

fixed file and java search. Occurrences and NLS Search don't have the problem
(they search for java elements only, so no '{' allowed.
